summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality and robustness of the DPMSolverMultistepScheduler across a wide range of configurations, including custom and duplicated timesteps, different solver orders, prediction and variance types, noise handling, FP16 support, and model checkpoint loading.
business_intent: Guarantee that the diffusion scheduler operates correctly in production environments, providing confidence for developers integrating the scheduler into AI pipelines and ensuring compatibility with various inference settings and hardware constraints.
